original_title: Porzellan-IsoSchizo-Küchentat des neurodermitischen Brockenfalls im Kaffeestrudel und das alles ganz teuer
overview: Set in a tiny kitchen, the act of cooking is accompanied solely by the John Bock’s exclamations, as the food he attempts to prepare flies up to attack him, staining his shirt and even setting him on fire
title: Porzellan-IsoSchizo-Küchentat des neurodermitischen Brockenfalls im Kaffeestrudel und das alles ganz teuer
